name: Blackout (itch) (Aviv13243546)
description:
Blackout

Play as a candle trying to escape a spooky Ghost house! But you can't see the ghosts in the dark. will you be able to escape?

Made for the WOWIE! JAM 3.0 in only 3 days! 

How does it fit the theme? -

You have to lower your own health to progress, also everytime you fail you place down a light that helps you on your next run.

Credits:

Game and art by: Aviv

Music by: PurpleSkies
